title: How great leaders innovate responsibly | Ken Chenault
itunes:author: Ken Chenault
description: In times of uncertainty, leaders have a responsibility to inspire hope. Sharing hard-won wisdom, business leader Ken Chenault talks about what it takes to enact positive, enduring change -- and why it's more important than ever to invest in responsible innovation that uplifts people and centers equality and fairness.
itunes:subtitle: How great leaders innovate responsibly | Ken Chenault
